title: Dragon Ball Super: Broly
synopsis: Forty-one years ago on Planet Vegeta, home of the infamous Saiyan warrior race, King Vegeta noticed a baby named Broly whose latent power exceeded that of his own son. Believing that Broly's power would one day surpass that of his child, Vegeta, the king sends Broly to the desolate planet Vampa. Broly's father Paragus follows after him, intent on rescuing his son. However, his ship gets damaged, causing the two to spend years trapped on the barren world, unaware of the salvation that would one day come from an unlikely ally.
related_anime: ['Dragon Ball Super', 'Dragon Ball Super: Broly - Skytree Super', 'Dragon Ball Super: Super Hero']
